video.title: Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt
video.synopsis: When a woman is rescued from a doomsday cult and lands in New York City, she must navigate a world she didn’t think even existed anymore.

episodes.synopsis: Imprisoned by a cult leader as a teenager, Midwesterner Kimmy is freed after 15 years. The first thing she decides to do is move to New York.
episodes.title: Kimmy Goes Outside!

episodes.synopsis: Kimmy has to throw an acceptable kids' birthday party to keep her new job with the filthy rich Voorhees family.
episodes.title: Kimmy Gets a Job!

episodes.synopsis: Kimmy and Jacqueline try to hide their pasts, while Titus lies to Lillian about money so he can spend it on headshots for his future.
episodes.title: Kimmy Goes on a Date!

episodes.synopsis: Kimmy has an eye-opening experience when Jacqueline introduces her to her plastic surgeon. Titus auditions for a Spider-Man musical.
episodes.title: Kimmy Goes to the Doctor!

episodes.synopsis: Kimmy's bunker-mate Cyndee visits New York with her new boyfriend, Brandon, whom Titus promptly outs. Charles makes his move with Kimmy.
episodes.title: Kimmy Kisses a Boy!

episodes.synopsis: Kimmy's GED class isn't as educational as she'd hoped. Lillian helps Titus shoot a music video ... in Jacqueline's house.
episodes.title: Kimmy Goes to School!

episodes.synopsis: Jacqueline asks Kimmy to help her plan a dinner party where Jacqueline can confirm if her husband, Julian, is cheating on her.
episodes.title: Kimmy Goes to a Party!

episodes.synopsis: Kimmy studies for her math GED exam with her classmate Dong, while Jacqueline changes her mind about getting divorced.
episodes.title: Kimmy is Bad at Math!

episodes.synopsis: Kimmy's 30th birthday party isn't quite the fun celebration of adulthood she wants it to be.
episodes.title: Kimmy Has a Birthday!

episodes.synopsis: Kimmy is torn between two guys and trying not to act like a fool. Titus finds a different kind of acting coach.
episodes.title: Kimmy's in a Love Triangle!

episodes.synopsis: Titus can't stop watching the trial of Kimmy's charismatic kidnapper on the Internet, while Kimmy turns to exercise to avoid testifying.
episodes.title: Kimmy Rides a Bike!

episodes.synopsis: Kimmy and Titus go back to Durnsville, Indiana so Kimmy can testify against the Reverend Wayne, but the trip doesn't go very well.
episodes.title: Kimmy Goes to Court!

episodes.synopsis: Kimmy is stuck in Durnsville. Jacqueline gets back in touch with her roots when she and Lillian drive to Indiana to find Kimmy.
episodes.title: Kimmy Makes Waffles!

episodes.synopsis: Titus's ex-wife sues him for spousal support. Kimmy still has feelings for Dong. Jacqueline's Sioux family gets fed up with her.
episodes.title: Kimmy Goes Roller Skating!

episodes.synopsis: Kimmy helps Jacqueline put her life back together after the divorce. Titus donates his old clothes and makes a connection with a construction worker.
episodes.title: Kimmy Goes on a Playdate!

episodes.synopsis: Titus develops a one-man show about his past life as a geisha. While Jacqueline tries to make Julian jealous, Lillian battles gentrification.
episodes.title: Kimmy Goes to a Play!

episodes.synopsis: Kimmy stages an intervention when ex-mole woman Gretchen joins another cult. Titus takes Mikey the construction worker on his first gay date.
episodes.title: Kimmy Kidnaps Gretchen!

episodes.synopsis: Kimmy needs to study for the GED, but she's worried about Dong getting deported. Jacqueline puts Buckley on Dyziplen to treat his hyperactivity.
episodes.title: Kimmy Gives Up!

episodes.synopsis: Hipsters invade the neighborhood when Titus rents his apartment on Airbnb. Kimmy finally reaches her limit with Jacqueline's self-centered attitude.
episodes.title: Kimmy Drives a Car!

episodes.synopsis: Jacqueline's gala plans hit a snag when Deirdre Robespierre throws a party the same night. Kimmy stops to pee at a bar and meets a cute Army vet.
episodes.title: Kimmy Walks Into a Bar!

episodes.synopsis: On Fake Christmas, Kimmy and Dong take a trip to the Poconos, and a Jewish family claims that Jacqueline's prized Mondrian is rightfully theirs.
episodes.title: Kimmy Goes to a Hotel!

episodes.synopsis: A drunk Uber passenger convinces Kimmy to stop repressing her emotions. Meanwhile, a broken R. Kelly cassette tape pushes Titus over the edge.
episodes.title: Kimmy Meets a Drunk Lady!

episodes.synopsis: Kimmy has her first therapy session with Andrea, but it's Lillian who helps her get in touch with her anger. Mikey comes out to his family.
episodes.title: Kimmy Goes to Her Happy Place!

episodes.synopsis: A celebrity psychologist with a TV talk show drives a wedge between Kimmy and her former bunker-mate Cyndee. Titus gives a teenage boy dating advice.
episodes.title: Kimmy Meets a Celebrity!

episodes.synopsis: Kimmy tries to help Andrea with her drinking problem. Jacqueline dates a pro bono lawyer for his money. Titus and Mikey talk about moving in together.
episodes.title: Kimmy Sees a Sunset!

episodes.synopsis: While Kimmy reunites with her mom at Universal Studios, Titus heads to Miami. Jacqueline invites Russ and his family to Thanksgiving dinner.
episodes.title: Kimmy Finds Her Mom!
